sourcesContent:
/*
|--------------------------------------------------------------------------
| Http Exception Handler
|--------------------------------------------------------------------------
|
| AdonisJs will forward all exceptions occurred during an HTTP request to
| the following class. You can learn more about exception handling by
| reading docs.
|
| The exception handler extends a base `HttpExceptionHandler` which is not
| mandatory, however it can do lot of heavy lifting to handle the errors
| properly.
|
*/

import Logger from '@ioc:Adonis/Core/Logger'
import HttpExceptionHandler from '@ioc:Adonis/Core/HttpExceptionHandler'

export default class ExceptionHandler extends HttpExceptionHandler {
  constructor() {
    super(Logger)
  }
}

import Env from '@ioc:Adonis/Core/Env' export default class PlantillaSeguridad { public forgotPassword(token: string) { let html = '

Sistema Fincapp

' html += "

Para solicitar el restablecimiento de su contrasea ingrese aqu

" return html } public resetPassword(token: string) { let html = '

Sistema Fincapp

' html += "

Para cambiar su contrasea ingrese aqu

" return html } }
